title: The Taliban want the world to think they've changed. Early signs suggest otherwise
content:
1. The Taliban want the world to think they've changed. Early signs suggest otherwise  CNN
  2. Abdul Ghani Baradar, the Taliban's defacto leader, remains a mysterious figure.  The Washington Post

  4. How to handle the chaos of the second Taliban era | Daily Sabah  Daily Sabah
  5. The strategy for Afghanistan went off course long before the U.S. exit  The Globe and Mail

localize.title: タリバンは自分たちが変わったと世界に思わせたいのです。初期の兆候はそうではないことを示している
塔利班希望世界认为他们已经改变。早期迹象表明并非如此
塔利班希望世界認爲他們已經改變。早期跡象表明並非如此
